Container.Name: MusicTaggerz
Container.Overview: MusicTaggerz is an automatic music tagger with MusicBrainz integration. It scans your music directory, matches albums against MusicBrainz, scores candidates (0-100), and auto-tags high-confidence matches while queuing uncertain ones for manual review via a modern web UI.
